title: Bachelor star Keira Maguire wows in a white mini dress at the Eagle Farm Racecourse
text:
She's the former Bachelor star who likes to show off her diverse sense of fashion at some of Australia's most prestigious events.

And on Saturday, Keira Maguire was a vision in white at the Eagle Farm Racecourse in Ascot, Brisbane.

The reality TV star attended the event as a judge for fashions on the field and took to Instagram to share a photo of herself alongside her well-dressed fellow judges.

Dressed to impress! Bachelor star Keira Maguire (pictured) put on a leggy display as she wowed in a white mini dress at the Eagle Farm Racecourse on Saturday

Keira looked elegant in a white mini dress, with a ruffled hem and long sleeves by Sofia The Label.

She accessorised the look with small chain purse, a pearl crown by Sylvy Earl and stiletto heels.

'So much fun today judging fashions in the field sponsored by @billy_j_boutique in my home town,' she wrote in the caption.

Race day glam! She accessorised her chic look with a pearl crown by Sylvy Earl

Keira rose to fame in 2016 after failing to find love with Richie Strahan on the fourth season of The Bachelor.

She then appeared on Bachelor In Paradise in 2017 where she found love with Jarrod Woodgate.

Back in August, Keira confirmed she'd split from Jarrod just months after they'd rekindled their relationship.

Former flames: The Bachelor star rose to fame on the fourth season of The Bachelor. She appeared on Bachelor In Paradise in 2017 where she found love with Jarrod Woodgate but their romance fizzled out in August 2019

In an Q and A session with her many fans on Instagram at the time, she was asked if she was 'still with that guy from Bachelor in Paradise?'

Keira bluntly replied: 'No we are not'.

The blonde beauty recently sparked rumours that she's dating Jett Kenny, the model son of Lisa Curry and Grant Kenny.

According to Woman's Day, the pair have also been liking each other's photos on social media, adding fuel to the fire.
description: She's the former Bachelor star who likes to show off her diverse sense of fashion at some of Australia's most prestigious events.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
